ipconfig: Display IP configuration for all network interfaces
dir: List files and directories in the current directory
systeminfo: Display detailed information about the computer's configuration
sfc /scannow: Run System File Checker to scan and repair system files
ping <host>: Send ICMP echo requests to test network connectivity
gpupdate /force: Force immediate update of Group Policy settings
wmic product get name,version: List installed software and their versions
msconfig: System Configuration Utility: Configure startup options
ipconfig /flushdns: Flush and reset the DNS resolver cache
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name: Add firewall inbound rule for TCP
Add firewall outbound rule for TCP
Add firewall inbound rule for UDP
Add firewall outbound rule for UDP
netsh interface portproxy show v4tov4: Display IPv4 to IPv4 port proxy settings
netsh interface portproxy show v4tov6: Display IPv4 to IPv6 port proxy settings
netsh interface portproxy show v6tov4: Display IPv6 to IPv4 port proxy settings
netsh interface portproxy show v6tov6: Display IPv6 to IPv6 port proxy settings
tracert <host>: Trace the route to a host
nslookup <host>: Query the DNS to find the IP address of a host
whoami: Display the username of the current user
hostname: Display the hostname of the computer
ver: Display the Windows version and other information
nbtstat -A <ip_address>: Display NetBIOS over TCP/IP information for a remote computer
netstat -b: Display all active TCP connections and the processes using them
netstat -n: Display active TCP connections and the numerical addresses they are connected to
netsh interface ipv6 show neighbors: Display the neighbor cache for IPv6
netsh interface ipv6 show tcpconnections: Display active TCP connections for IPv6
netsh interface ipv6 show udpconnections: Display active UDP connections for IPv6
netsh interface ipv4 show address <inter: Display IPv4 address information for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show address <inter: Display IPv6 address information for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show config <interf: Display detailed IPv4 configuration information for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show config <interf: Display detailed IPv6 configuration information for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show route <interfa: Display IPv4 routing table for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show route <interfa: Display IPv6 routing table for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show neighbors <int: Display the ARP table for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show neighbors <int: Display the neighbor cache for IPv6 for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show tcpconnections: Display active TCP connections for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show tcpconnections: Display active TCP connections for IPv6 for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show udpconnections: Display active UDP connections for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show udpconnections: Display active UDP connections for IPv6 for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show ipstats <inter: Display IPv4 statistics for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show ipstats <inter: Display IPv6 statistics for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show ipinterface <i: Display IPv4 interface statistics for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show ipinterface <i: Display IPv6 interface statistics for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show global <interf: Display global IPv4 information for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 show global <interf: Display global IPv6 information for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 show subinterfaces: Display IPv4 subinterface information for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 set address <interf: Set a static IPv4 address for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 set address <interf: Set a static IPv6 address for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 set dnsservers <int: Set a static DNS server for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 add dnsservers <int: Add a DNS server for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv4 set address <interf: Set a DHCP IPv4 address for a specific interface
netsh interface ipv6 set address <interf: Set a DHCP IPv6 address for a specific interface with a specific DHCP server
Set a DHCP IPv6 address for a specific interface with two DHCP servers
Set a DHCP IPv6 address for a specific interface with three DHCP servers
Set a DHCP IPv6 address for a specific interface with four DHCP servers
ipconfig /all: Display detailed IP configuration for all network interfaces
tasklist /svc: List all running processes and their associated services
gpresult /r: Display Resultant Set of Policy for the current user
fsutil fsinfo drives: List all drives on the system
fsutil volume diskfree C:: Display free space on drive C:
wmic os get lastbootuptime: Display the last system boot time
driverquery /v: Display detailed information about installed drivers
systeminfo | findstr /C:\"Domain\" /C:\": Display domain and logon server information
tasklist /fi \"memusage gt 100000\": List processes with memory usage greater than 100,000 KB
systeminfo | findstr /C:\"System Type\": Display whether the system is 32-bit or 64-bit
fsutil fsinfo ntfsinfo C:: Display NTFS file system information for drive C:
ver | findstr /B /C:\"Version\": Display the Windows version using ver command
wmic process list brief: List running processes in brief format
